channel.title: iTunes being retarded
channel.description: Whenever I try to open iTunes, Windows detects an error and it stops working and a little box pops up saying that it has stopped working and I have to close it. Then, iTunes opens up after closing it and the same thing happens over and over again. I have tried just ending the process with Windows Task Manager but it doesn't affect it. Could anyone tell me what I could do to prevent this?

item.title: iTunes being retarded
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

Did you try to reinstall or repair iTunes?

Read full topic

item.title: iTunes being retarded
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You might have a proxy enabled via the control panel, I had that once and didn’t notice it for hours. If not, try uninstalling it an downloading the latest version, that always works for me.

Read full topic
